content:
Looks like a few of us are getting the error below. Is this an issue with the template? I'm using fhir.base.template#current

org.hl7.fhir.exceptions.FHIRException: The auto-build infrastructure does not publish IGs that contain HTML pages without the publish-box present ([searchform.html]). For further information, see note at http://wiki.hl7.org/index.php?title=FHIR_Implementation_Guide_Publishing_Requirements#HL7_HTML_Standards_considerations

Me too. It looks like a searchform.html from hl7.fhir.us.hai: Healthcare Associated Infection Implementation Guide got included in to the template package... At least that is what appears in the footer on the search form page.
